description: Refill your Backpacker Repeller for 24 hours of mosquito protection.Provides 5m dome of protection in 10–30 minutes.Each mat lasts for up to 4 hours and goes from blue to white once empty, making it easy to know when to change the mat.Active ingredient: D-cis/trans allethrin.Only for use with Backpacker Repeller.Includes 6 repellent mats (24 of protection).
name: Thermacell Mat Only Refill 24 Hours
